#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{  int t;
    cin>>t;
    int a,b,c,d;
    a=t/5;
    t=t-a*5;
    b=t/3;
    t=t-b*3;
    c=t/2;
    t=t-c*2;
    d=t;
    cout<<a<<endl;
    cout<<b<<endl;
    cout<<c<<endl;
    cout<<d<<endl;




return 0;
}
